title: ERROR 004
body: someone help me my league of legends with error 004 to install the new patch (7.15) unstall  and reinstalled

replies.body: Ahhhhh random error codes don't always really help all that much eh? Most of the time that 004 error can be fixed up by double checking that your OS has all the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place, but hit me back up if that guide doesn't help!
